location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '20'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View across Linga [Lingeh] from an elevated position. At right a long, tunnel-like structure is visible, while a large three-storey building is visible immediately right of centre in the background. A number of figures can be seen. Throughout the town window towers (badghirs) are visible.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘20’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
